thread.section_title: About.com Business Travel: What's Hot Now
thread.title: Business Travel Luggage

title: Business Travel Luggage
text: A solid selection of brand-name luggage from Samsonite, Tumi, Travelpro, American Tourister, Skyway and more. Pros: Opportunity for deals - the online retailer sometimes carries closout or overstocked items. Cons: No chance to test out or feel the luggage before purchasing No customer service help Shopping Tips: Be sure to do some comparison shopping before clicking "buy" and don't forget to factor the cost of shipping for your orders. More Â» 3. Warehouse Clubs What You'll Find: Visit Costco, Sam's Club or BJ's for a rotating selection of quality luggage from names like Samsonite, Travelpro and private label lugggage shops. Pros: Some of the best deals on luggage available Cons: Limited selection No customer service help It can be hard to find single pieces of luggage - oftentimes, sets are all that are available Shopping Tips: To get the best deal, do your research beforehand and be patient! 4. Walmart A decent selection of brand-name luggage from American Tourister, Wenger, Jeep, and private label shops. Pros: Better quality than you might expect Cons: Less selection than department stores No customer service help 5. Company Stores/Private Retailers Samsonite, Victorinox (makers of Swiss Army luggage), and Tumi all have storefronts, where you will find the best selection and service for that particular brand. Private luggage shops (not exclusive retailers for any one brand) will offer the same expert customer service with a more varied (in terms of brands) selection. Pros: More options within a particular brand Cons:
